content.question: A circuit is constructed with the battery, the switch, the inductor, and the three identical resistors shown. After the switch is closed, what is the initial rate of change of current in the circuit?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 2 V over L" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction 2 V over 3 L" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 13.5: Circuits with Resistors and Inductors (LR Circuits)

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
